comment: Decided to give this another try.. Battery life is much improved but still uses about 3% per hour which is still quite excessive

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Battery Performance improved in V18 build.  Thanks for the feedback.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Thank you, this is excellent feedback, thank you again.

author: Gavin Sumner
comment: Fast response from dev regarding an issue I was having... Absolutely love this watch face.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: This is resolved by uninstalling the watch face and re-installing it, for some reason this is not limited to just this watch face but some others as well.  But a uninstall and reinstall will fix it.  Seems to be extremely random error this one.

title: Love it!

author: Pamela Wood Browne
comment: Love the design. My favorite watch face. Quick response from developer too.
title: Awesome!

author: Touchwood Tumbleweed
comment: The fruit is a very nice addition.  Could you maybe make it so that we can color our own fruit? Maybe implement a color wheel? (Could also be used for the text and the tree) That would be even more awesome!

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: I will definitely be looking into this, thanks for the heads up.

title: Love the details

author: Casey Cunningham
comment: Very different then the rest. Works great and looks even better.
title: Its a keeper

author: Scott Dunlap
comment: Great face. Totally different than the 200+ faces I have. Would like to request a way to increase the timeout to ambient screen. It's so nice in color I want it to stick around longer.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: This has been added in V7.

title: Very nice

author: Patrick McGhee
comment: I get the most comments about this watch face. A little less than "is that the Apple Watch" but a close second.
title: Neat

author: Alvie Rodgers
comment: This is a great looking and unique face... Had a minor issue on my Zenwatch (which has been fixed) and contacted the developer... Responded almost instantly! Great communication and support from the dev.
title: Fantastic

author: Iain Baker
comment: I'm a tight git, so the thought of paying for a watch face when there are so many good free ones disturbs me, but there was next to no hesitation for this one! Ticks all my geek boxes and is attractive too
title: Never thought I'd pay

author: Mark P
comment: Wicked watchface like nothing I've seen on Google store , works perfect on my Sony smartwatch 3
title: Total unique
